title: BRIEF-Appaloosa Takes Share Stake In Comcast, Cuts In Terraform Power
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Appaloosa LP :
* APPALOOSA TAKES SHARE STAKE OF ABOUT 2 MILLION CLASS A SHARES IN COMCAST CORP‍​ - SEC FILING
* APPALOOSA ‍​TAKES SHARE STAKE OF ABOUT 2.3 MILLION COMMON SHARES IN MGM RESORTS INTERNATIONAL
* APPALOOSA CUTS SHARE STAKE IN TERRAFORM POWER INC TO 4.6 MILLION CLASS A COMMON SHARES FROM 8.6 MILLION CLASS A COMMON SHARES ‍​
* APPALOOSA LP - CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF DEC 31, 2017 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF SEPT 30, 2017 ‍​ Source text for quarter ended Dec 31, 2017: ( bit.ly/2CmrRSi ) Source text for quarter ended Sept 30, 2017 ( bit.ly/2zJRjl2 )
